item.description:
Hi Everyone!
Looking forward to good weather this coming Sunday and a lovely ride to the Old Mill Restaurant for Brunch; Westminster/Princeton
We will be riding Route 140 out past Mount Wachusett and should see some lovely foliage.

Please respond as to where you would like to meet up:

9:00 a.m. at Brockton VA, front parking lot, Route 123/Belmont St. Leaving at 9:15a.m. (Maureen, Melissa, Aaron, so far)

10:00a.m. at Dunkin Donuts, Route 1A, @ Wrentham Mall. Leaving at 10:30a.m. (Jeri, Joe, etc)

I need a head count so that we can make a reservation, so please respond if you will be coming and where you will be meeting.
item.name: Old Mill Restaurant
